__e: Rachel's the most talented person I've ever met.

Kurt, I, um... look, I'll say it till the day I die:
No, a girl with that much talent wouldn't marry you.
I mean, it takes time, but if you're talented, it's not a question of if, it's just a question of when, you know?
Your mom says you're gifted, but I'm not seeing it.
Well, last night, he saw how beautiful you were..., ...how talented and no, you don't have to act it... how intelligent you are.
"Honey, but they came to supper twice," and they said that I was very talented and your father had a gift, and that... "everyone at the lake could play a part."

And I know that like, a lot has changed, and you're going through some hard stuff right now, but I just, I think you should know that I think you are such a beautiful, wonderful person, and you are so, so, so talented, and I just know that everything's gonna be fine.
